articles.title: Israeli soldiers allegedly shot, falsely arrested American Palestinian boy, 13 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: On November 1, Israeli soldiers allegedly shot Malik Jaffal in the arm while he was on his way home from playing soccer with friends | World News
articles.content: A 13-year-old American Palestinian boy who was detained in an Israeli prison was released on Wednesday, December 20. The family of Malik Jaffal has alleged he was shot in the arm, and later strip-sea… [+2608 chars]

articles.title: Respiratory viruses increasing as Americans prepare to gather for the holidays: CDC - ABC News

articles.content:
Respiratory virus season has kicked off in the United States as Americans get ready to travel to celebrate the holidays.
